DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation safety Trivalent Subunit Influenza Vaccine Produced either Mammalian Cell Culture embryonated Hen Eggs subject 18 year age without underlie medical condition evaluation immunogenicity subset subject underlie medical condition , compare egg-based vaccine post marketing setting .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Influenza Vaccine Produced Either Mammalian Cell Culture Embryonated Hen Eggs Adults Elderly With Without Underlying Medical Conditions , Immunogenicity Subset Subjects With Underlying Medical Conditions
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects 18 year age , mentally competent , willing able give inform consent prior study entry ; 2 . Able comply study procedures requirement . 1 . History anaphylaxis , serious vaccine reaction , hypersensitivity vaccine component ; 2 . Fatal prognosis underlie medical condition ( < 12 month life expectancy ) ; 3 . History GuillainBarre syndrome ; 4 . Bleeding diathesis receive anticoagulant coumarin type ; 5 . Hospitalization residence nursing care facility ; 6 . Planned receive seasonal influenza vaccine outside study ; 7 . Receipt another vaccine within 2 week ( inactivated vaccine ) 4 week ( live vaccine ) prior enrollment study ; 8 . Fever ( define axillary temperature ≥38.0°C ) acute illness within 3 day prior study vaccination ; 9 . Receipt another investigational agent within 30 day prior enrollment study completion safety followup period another study , whichever longer , unwilling refuse participation another clinical study end safety follow period study ; 10 . Any condition , , opinion investigator , might prevent subject participation interfere evaluation study objective ; 11 . Females pregnant nursing ( breastfeed ) mother , female childbearing potential sexually active use plan use acceptable birth control measure first 3 week vaccination . Oral , inject implanted hormonal contraceptive , diaphragm condom spermicidal agent intrauterine device consider acceptable form birth control .
